nodes.text: The Imperial Palace was a towering palace built of gray marble that was located in the center of the city of Livien Magnus, the capital of Ord Radama. In front of the Palace stood a massive statue of the Sith Lord Darth Malgus.
During the Galactic Civil War, the Palace was the headquarters for the Imperial presence on Ord Radama. It was both the Planetary Governor's seat and the location of the Empire's barracks.
